summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations that can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines 1 priority open recommendation for the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, as of April 2021. FDIC should work with other banking regulators to...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation
